title: Energy is Forever, and so are YOU!
description: Introducing a new series created to dispel the myth that science and spirituality are at odds with one another. With all the recent leaps in scientific discovery and the re-emergence of spirituality over organized religion, these books have arrived right on time to teach your children about the power within, while they learn about science and its role in their day to day lives.The Hello Me series launches with two books available immediately and more to follow.
author: Michael Poeltl
